title: Update Driver Documents
description: A driver's vehicle insurance is expiring. They must upload their new insurance card to keep their account active.

tasks.description: The system sends an automated reminder to the driver that their insurance document expires in 15 days.
The driver uploads a picture of their new insurance card via the driver app.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new document is received by the system.

tasks.description: The system uses OCR to read the policy number and expiration date from the image.
tasks.expected_outcome: The document details are automatically extracted.

tasks.description: The system validates the new expiration date and updates the driver's profile, clearing the expiration warning.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver's account remains in good standing.
